about_the_game: Cassius is a first-person story-driven puzzle game exploring the mysteries of Blackhaven Hall, a sprawling historically accurate colonial estate evacuated at the height of the American Revolution.  Journey back to the 1781 and decode the dark secrets lurking behind America's founding.
